item.description:

Investigating - Start time : 07/06/2022 16:34 UTC
Service impact : We observe disturbances on network communications in RBX8
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently investigating the cause of this issue.

item.title: [MRS/SGP][Backbone] - Degraded backbone
item.description:
Jun 7, 16:43 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 07/06/2022 12:24 UTC
End Time : 07/06/2022 15:00 UTC
Service impact : The original cause has now been fixed by our partner. The connectivity has been fully restored and rollback is terminated. Latency is back to optimal.
Root cause : Upon further investigation, our Network OPERATION teams advised that the fault was related to our partner fiber cuts.

Jun 7, 15:48 UTC
Identified - Update : Problem is identified, Network OPERATIONS team are working with the Telco provider to accelerate the links restauration. The teams are still working on traffic rerouting.
Root cause : Partner fiber cuts.

Jun 7, 14:05 UTC
Update - Update : Our teams are working to solve the problem. A rerouting of the traffic is underway.

Jun 7, 13:27 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jun 7, 13:13 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/06/2022 12:24 UTC
Service impact : Backbone links between Marseille and Singapore are currently down
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem
